titleStmt.title: A vindication of the two letters concerning alterations in the liturgy in answer to Vox cleri / by a London presbyter.
titleStmt.author: Basset, William, 1644-1695.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Basset by Wing.
This work appears at reel 902:31 as Wing V533 and at reel 1274:9 as Wing B1055 (entry cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
